app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Singistic Karaoke App
app_description: Is singing your first love Do you want to stand out in the league of professional singers Singistic is the online karaoke app for iOS users. Having great UI and an exhaustive range of superhit Hindi English Bangla and Urdu songs it is an absolute delight for music lovers! Install the best music player for iOS devices to get lost in the world of music for free away from all concerns. Now you no longer need to waste your time looking for the most user friendly karaoke app. Just a one time login gives you access to thousands of songs across multiple genres artists and languages. Install the app to tune into bliss! Features of the Best Music Recording App for iPhone Sing in sync with lyrics Isn t it annoying when you forget the lyrics to your favourite song while you sing it With Singistic this will never happen. Get Musical Guidance If you do not remember the lyrics or melody by heart simply select the Guide option and practice as many times as you want to. Record Whenever You Want To Once you install the karaoke app you can use it anywhere and anytime at your convenience. Pitch it Up You can change the pitch or tempo of the song transform or customize as per your like. Record in a Format of Your Choice If you re camera conscious and would rather want to record only the audio of your performance Our song recording app allows you to do so too But we highly recommend that you record a video. After all your listeners must recognize the face behind the talent . Apply Studio Effects Want your song to have the effect of having been recorded in the studio Add the echo or reverb effect in the best music recording app. Get Access to an Exhaustive Library Just one tap will make you enter a world of music that you have never explored before. Thousands of Hindi English Bangla and Urdu songs are now available at your fingertips. Spread the word about your talent After recording your favourite track share the audio or video recording of your favourite karaoke songs with your friends and family across social media. Always up to date musical library Find all the latest hits and trending music albums across all four languages on the best music recording app. List Of Genres Pop R B Rock Rap Hip Hop Country K pop Sufi and much more! Top Hindi Bollywood Songs Artists Arijit Singh Vishal Mishra Aastha Gill Darshan Raval Jasleen Royal Asha Bhosle Papon Badshah Yo Yo Honey Singh Shaan and many more! Top English Songs Artists Doja Cat The Weeknd Sia Taylor Swift Ed Sheeran Adam Levine Jason Mraz Jason Derulo The Black Eyed Peas Coldplay and many more! Top Bangla Songs Artists Dola Monir Khan Habib Wahid Arman Alif Meher Afroz Shaon Shohag Habib Wahid Sabina Yasmin Emon Khan Srikanto Acharya and many more! Top Urdu Songs Artists Sami Yusuf Atif Aslam Ghulam Ali Iqbal Bano Shafqat Amanat Ali Bilal Saeed Aima Baig Zeeshan Parwez Aziz Mian Junaid Jamshed and many more! Stop at nothing to showcase your love for karaoke to the rest of the world! Install Singistic the best karaoke app and let the magic begin! Practice for as long and as many times as you want. Also we would love to hear from you! If you have any issues using Singistic or want us to add some more features to this app do not hesitate to tell us about it in the comments below. Giving you a seamless musical experience is our only priority and the Singistic iOS app delivers just that. So deep dive into the world of thousands of songs at the tap of a button on your iPhone. Use the free karaoke app and have the best musical experience of your life.
